Name: Seed Dispensary
Title: Seed Dispensary
Desc: A special container obtained from Madame Ping. According to her, this dispensary has the power to "generate seeds"...

Talent.Name: Seed Dispensary
Talent.Desc: <color=#FFFFFFFF>When you play a Support Card with an original cost of at least 2 Elemental Dice: </color>Spend 1 less Elemental Die. (Once per Round)\n<color=#FFFFFFFF>$[K3]: 2</color>

K3.Name: <color=#FFFFFFFF>Usage(s)</color>
K3.Desc: After this card's effect is triggered, 1 <color=#FFFFFFFF>Usage</color> of it will be consumed.\nThis card will be discarded immediately once it has 0 <color=#FFFFFFFF>Usages</color> remaining.
